original: Welcome.Welcome to the ROOMs testing lab.Turn right and open the first test room
zh_trans: 欢迎！欢迎来到 ROOMS 测试实验室。请右转并打开第一间测试房间

original: Today's task : follow the prompts of the lights to enter the room, turn on the machine, collect energy balls through the portal, and then return
zh_trans: 今天的任务：跟随灯光指示进入房间，打开机器，穿过传送门收集能量球，然后返回

original: Before starting the test, we would like to remind you of the following points:
zh_trans: 在开始测试之前，我需要提醒你几点：

original: Firstly, pay attention to natural disasters caused by rainy and snowy weather
zh_trans: 一，注意由雨雪天气造成的自然灾害

original: Secondly, our former experimenters dropped some equipment across from the portal.They can use ONLY ONE TIME .We encourage you to use them to get out of trouble, but some equipment can also be harmful to you. Please be careful to distinguish between them
zh_trans: 二，我们的正式实验人员在传送门的对面放置了一些仪器。这些仪器只能使用一次！我们建议你使用这些仪器来摆脱麻烦，不过一些仪器对你来说可能有害。请注意区分它们！

original: Thirdly, we understand that you may feel fearful of the unknown and refuse to pass through the portal, but please be prepared to face even more terrifying unknowns
zh_trans: 三，我们理解你对未知感到恐惧，并且拒绝穿过传送门。但是请准备好面对更加恐怖的未知

original: Fourthly, we do not object to you deceiving the portal with your cleverness, but please be Prepare for unforeseen consequences.
zh_trans: 四，我们不反对你用你的小聪明去欺骗传送门，但请做好承担一切后果的准备

original: After collecting enough energy balls and completing the mission, we will use the portal to send you safely out of here. Have a nice,safe day.
zh_trans: 在收集到足够的能量球并完成任务后，我们会使用传送门安全的将你传送至这里。祝您愉快，安全！

original: The portal has been opened and this space will collapse in 15 seconds. Please evacuate as soon as possible
zh_trans: 传送门已开启，这个空间将在15秒后坍缩。请尽快离开！

original: Well done! you have collected enough energy balls, and the organization greatly appreciates your contribution. Please pass through the next portal and we will send you safely away
zh_trans: 漂亮！你已经收集到了足够的能量球，组织非常感谢你的贡献。请穿过下一个传送门，我们将会你安全的送走

original: Warning, lab will undergo disinfection to kill potential contamination. Please leave as soon as possible
zh_trans: 警告：实验室将进行消毒以消灭潜在威胁。请尽快离开。
警告！检测到龙卷风. 请与其保持安全距离
